title: Initialize repository and create base project layout
body: Created the first CosmoSim repository with minimal folders and cosmosim.py stub.

title: Add .gitignore and outputs directory
body: Added Python-focused .gitignore, created outputs/ and added .gitkeep for artifact tracking.

title: Set up Python environment and dependencies
body: Created virtual environment and installed JAX, matplotlib, and required dependencies.

title: Implement first simulation loop skeleton
body: Added basic simulation loop with fixed timestep and minimal configuration in cosmosim.py.

title: Define minimal body and simulation state representation
body: Implemented early position, velocity, and mass containers for a few bodies.

title: Add naive Euler integrator v0
body: Implemented Euler-based update for positions and velocities, wired into the main loop.

title: Implement first gravitational force calculation
body: Added direct pairwise Newtonian gravity force computation using nested loops.

title: Hard-code initial inline scenario
body: Embedded early random or simple multi-body setup directly into cosmosim.py before scenario modularization.

title: Introduce CLI argument parsing (argparse)
body: Added --scenario, --steps, and output options enabling command-line simulation control.

title: Implement scenario registry and extraction
body: Created standalone scenario builder functions and registered them under scenario names.

title: Implement Random N-Body scenario v1
body: Added random position/velocity initialization and parameterized cluster radius.

title: Implement Two-Body orbital scenario
body: Created a scenario with a central mass and orbiting body with approximate circular velocity.

title: Implement Three-Body chaotic scenario
body: Added scenario for chaotic gravitational dynamics to test integrator stability.

title: Implement first JSON exporter
body: Added JSON export for positions/velocities enabling offline inspection.

title: Implement first PNG snapshot renderer (matplotlib)
body: Added 2D scatter plot renderer for saving PNG frames of simulation output.

title: Implement JSON multi-frame exporter (v0)
body: Extended exporter to write full frame sequences for replay or web viewer use.

title: Add trajectory plotting capability
body: Added matplotlib trajectory plots to visualize body paths over time.

title: Refactor stepping logic into kernel abstraction
body: Extracted physics stepping into kernel_step() for cleaner architecture.

title: Move physics functions into engine module
body: Separated force calculations, integrator, and energy functions into engine/.

title: Implement energy calculation helpers
body: Added functions for kinetic and potential energy to track simulation drift.

title: Add stability checks using energy drift
body: Introduced warnings for sudden divergence or excessive energy error.

title: Introduce base configuration object/dict
body: Created a central configuration structure for dt, steps, N, radius, and topology.

title: Implement CLI parameter override system
body: Added custom parameter parsing (--params N=50,radius=10) and merging logic.

title: Implement default + scenario parameter merging
body: Scenario defaults now merge with global defaults then apply CLI overrides.

title: Convert state arrays to JAX arrays (experiment)
body: Migrated the state container to jax.numpy to test performance and consistency.

title: Implement JAX-based force computation experiment
body: Rebuilt gravitational force calculation using jax.numpy and tested accuracy.

title: Implement flat topology displacement helper v0
body: Created a simple displacement function for flat Euclidean space.

title: Implement torus wrapping experiment v0
body: Added periodic boundary wrapping as a precursor to full torus topology support.

title: Prototype sphere displacement calculation
body: Implemented an early approximation of sphere-surface displacement for experimentation.

title: Create initial web viewer stub
body: Added empty viewer module verifying JSON fields align with future needs.
